title: 10 perch land Located just 5 minutes away from Godagama junction
details:
10 perch land Located just 5 minutes away from Godagama junction. Land bordering a breath-taking paddy field.
300m From High Level Road
• 3 phase electricity
• Wide Road
• Concrete drains
• Bank loans(approved housing plan also available)
Price per perch: 260,000/=
